description: During my 8 months at PayByPhone, I contributed to maintaining and increasing the coverage of the Android team's automation test scripts using frameworks such as Espresso, UiAutomator, and JetPack Compose to ensure the appearances of the UI and the various functionalities within the app continues to work as expected. Additionally, I also helped maintain and update utility Android applications using Kotlin that helps support the team.

Throughout the 8 months I spent at SAP, I had the opportunity to lead the quality assurance step implementing a new feature. Ensuring the feature was ready for release; including creating, writing up, and executing test plans. I also supported team with various testing for both regression and new features to ensure quality performance in terms of functionality and performance through examining API calls in the network. Furthermore, I contributed to debugging and fixing outstanding bugs to help improve the overall performance of our team owned features while increasing the overall coverage of codes owned by the team via writing unit tests with both JavaScript and TypeScript.
